comments.content: It does ring a bell. Looks like some Mecanorma, Letraset or Image Club "fun font" to me. A nice alternative might be FF Dolores by Tobias Frere-Jones.

I figured it out...Improv. Made by Noel Rubin in 1994 for Image Club Graphics.   
   
 [Improv](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125938/http:/www.eyewire.com/cgi-bin/WebObjects/View.woa/wa/viewProduct?product=3)
